annotations.text:
42. The Study of Language – George Yule, Cambridge University Press,
Noida, 2008
43. A Course in Linguistics – Tarni Prasad, Prentice Hall of India, New
Delhi, 2008
44. An Introduction to Sociolinguisics – Ronald Wardhaugh, Blackwell,
USA, 1995
45. Language Its nature, development and origin – Otto Jespersen, Surjeet
Publications, Delhi, 2007
46. Indian Theories of Meaning – K. Kunjunni Raja, The Adayar Library
and Research Centre, Chennai, 2000
47. Indo-Aryan Loan words in Malayalam – K. Godavarma, ISDL,
Thiruvananthapuram, 2017
48. Readings in Language and Linguistics – A.P. Andrewskutty, University
of Kerala, Thiruvananthapuram, 2013
49. A Short history of Linguistics – R.H. Robins, Routledge, London, 2016
50. A Little book of Language – David Crystal, Orient Blackswan, New
Delhi, 2010
51. Language – Leonard Bloomfield, Motilal Banarsidass Publishers, Delhi,
2012
52. An Introduction to Descriptive Linguistics, Oxford & IBH Publishing
Co., New Delhi, 1970
53. Language and Gender A Reader – Jennifer Coates(ed.), Blackwell,
Australia, 1998
54. Lexicography An Introduction – Howard Jackson, Routledge, London,
2002
55. Language Death – David Crystal, Cambridge University Press, UK, 2014
56. Course in General Linguistics - Saussure Ferdinand de, Bloomsbury,
London, 2013
57. Introductory Linguistics - Hall A Robert, Motilal Banarsidass, Patna -
1969
58. Linguistics An Introduction - Radford Andrew and others, Cambridge,
New York - 1999
59. Language and Linguistics An Introduction - John Lyons, Cambridge,
New York - 1981
60. Socio Linguistics - Trudgill Peter, Penguin, England - 1983.
